de.geofencing.event.notification

Class NotificationEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.event.Event
      • de.geofencing.event.notification.NotificationEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminNotificationEvent, DeviceNotificationEvent, SendMailEvent

    public abstract class NotificationEvent
extends Event
    Event for sending String messages to a recipient
    Author:
    Markus Thral

    • Constructor Detail

      • NotificationEvent

        public NotificationEvent()
        Constructor for serializing.

      • NotificationEvent

        public NotificationEvent(java.lang.String description,
                         int minor,
                         Trigger trigger,
                         java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String message)
        Creates event with title and message. The message can be extended with further information (i.e. data about the triggering Device) in the trigger method
        Parameters:
        description - Description of the Event
        minor - Minor of the Geofence
        trigger - Trigger object which describes the behavior of the device to trigger the Event
        title - Title or subject of the message
        message - Message which is sent to the recipient
